snippet: 2 weeks ago - 하이(HYBE)는 음악에 기반한 엔터테인먼트 라이프스타일 플랫폼이다. 1997년부터 2005년까지 JYP 엔터테인먼트에서 수석 작곡가로 활동한 방시혁이 2005년 2월 1일에 빅히트 엔터테인먼트를 설립했다. 연예·엔터테인먼트 업종에서 매니지먼트 대행, 음반 제작, 무역 사업을 하고 있다.

위키백과, 우리 모두의 백과사전.

위키백과의 자매 프로젝트에서 하이브; 문서를 찾아보세요:

위키낱말사전 (낱말사전)

위키책 (교과서)

위키인용집 (인용)

위키문헌 (도서관)

위키배움터 (교육 자료)

공용 (미디어)

위키뉴스 (뉴스)

위키데이터 (연결된 데이터베이스)

위키생물종 (종 디렉터리)

위키백과에 ‘하이브;’ 문서가 존재하지 않습니다.

직접 문서를 만들 수 있습니다.
비슷한 문서가 있는지 검색해 보세요.
위키백과에서 이 제목을 가리키는 문서를 조회해 보세요.

이 메시지가 표출되는 다른 이유:

문서를 최근에 생성했다면 데이터베이스 업데이트가 지연되어 보이지 않을 수 있습니다. 몇 분 기다리거나 새로 고침을 시도해 보세요.
위키백과의 문서 제목은 띄어쓰기나 첫 글자를 제외한 영어의 대/소문자를 구분합니다. 다른 제목으로도 검색해본 뒤에 알맞은 문서로 넘겨주기 문서를 만드는 것을 고려해 보세요.
과거에 있던 문서가 삭제되었나요? 삭제 기록을 확인해 보세요. 문서가 복구될 이유가 있다면, 삭제 이유를 확인한 후에 복구 토론에서 토론해주세요.

title: HYBE CEO: 2026 Marks HYBE 2.0 Realization Year
raw_content:
조선일보
2026년 2월 5일(목)신문·잡지 보기|신문구독|English|日本語|中文조선멤버십조선경제오피니언정치사회국제건강동계올림픽문화·연예멤버십몰콘텐츠판땅집고BEMIL 군사세계헬스조선IT조선조선에듀어린이조선일보산&트래블이코노미조선신문은 선생님THE BOUTIQUE행복플러스주간조선여성조선월간조선민학수 올댓골프TopclassLife&LearningEnglish日本語中文검색원하시는 페이지를 찾을 수 없습니다서비스 이용에 불편을 드려 대단히 죄송합니다. 찾으시는 페이지의 주소가 잘못 입력되었거나, 변경 또는 삭제되어 사용할 수 없습니다. 입력하신 페이지의 주소를 다시 한 번 확인해 주시기 바랍니다. 만약 같은 문제가 지속적으로 발생할 경우 고객센터로 문의해 주시기 바랍니다. 감사합니다.이전 페이지로 이동조선닷컴 홈으로 이동오피니언사설칼럼朝鮮칼럼 The Column태평로동서남북경제포커스만물상에스프레소데스크에서기자의 시각특파원 칼럼기자수첩팔면봉ESSAY전문가 칼럼정치정치 일반청와대국회·정당북한외교·국방행정국제국제 일반미국중국 | 일본아시아유럽중동·아프리카·중남미해외토픽사회사회 일반사건사고법조교육노동교통·환경복지·의료취업피플부음·인사아무튼, 주말전국조선경제WEEKLY BIZ테크과학산업·재계자동차부동산생활경제중기·벤처스타트업 취중잡담경제 일반머니증권·금융국제경제재테크스포츠스포츠 일반야구해외야구축구해외축구농구배구골프스포츠포토건강조선몰문화·연예연예 일반스타 | 방송영화 소식 | 음악연예 포토문화 일반책 | 영화음악 | 공연미술·전시종교·학술방송·미디어건축·디자인패션·뷰티여행 | 음식·맛집리빙조선리더스조선일보 구독신청초판서비스신문은 선생님오늘의 운세DB조선지면 PDF보기인물검색사진검색뉴스 라이브러리뉴스Q뉴스레터오피니언정치국제사회조선경제스포츠건강문화·연예조선리더스조선몰조선일보 공식 SNS 페이스북트위터유튜브인스타그램주소: 서울특별시 중구 세종대로21길 30 | 대표번호 02)724-5114인터넷신문등록번호: 서울 아 01718등록(발행)일자: 2011년 07월 26일발행인·편집인: 홍준호개인정보처리방침청소년보호정책(책임자: 나민수)Copyright 조선일보 All rights reserved. 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지.회사소개기자채용고객센터독자권익보호위원회기사제보뉴지엄광고안내콘텐츠구매제휴문의사이트맵조선미디어 관계사개인정보처리방침사이트맵Copyright 조선일보 All rights reserved. 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지.

snippet: "2026 will be an important year when scarcity-based online-offline integrated experience models are designed and tested for innovation in future music fandom business models , just as Hybe has done in the past." Published January 2, 2026
title: Hybe CEO Lee Jae-sang: 2026 to Be Year of Hybe 2.0 Results - Seoul Economic Daily
raw_content: Hybe CEO Lee Jae-sang: 2026 to Be Year of Hybe 2.0 Results - Seoul Economic DailySkip to main contentSeoul Economic DailyMarketsPropertyFinanceBusinessTechnologyPoliticsSocietyCultureSportsInternationalSeoul Economic Daily KSTSeoul Economic DailyKorea's Business Authority Since 1960한국어MarketsPropertyFinanceBusinessTechnologyPoliticsSocietyCultureSportsInternationalHybe CEO Lee Jae-sang: 2026 to Be Year of Hybe 2.0 ResultsTechnology|Published 2026.01.02. 10:30:54|By Yeon Seung|SummaryAAAHybe CEO Lee Jae-sang: 2026 to Be Year of Hybe 2.0 Results"If 2025 was a year of 'investment' that laid the strategic foundation for 'Hybe (352820.KS) 2.0,' then 2026 will be the beginning of 'realization' when those results start to become visible," Hybe CEO Lee Jae-sang said in his New Year's message on Thursday.Lee emphasized that this year will be a turning point when Hybe 2.0 strategy begins to deliver tangible results. "For us, 2025 was a period of strategic investment and strengthening our foundation to enhance the company's sustainable growth capabilities," he said. "This year will demonstrate to the market that our bold preemptive investments were in the right direction and that the time spent on improving our fundamentals was worthwhile."Lee presented five key objectives that all employees must work together to achieve this year: confirming the commercial viability of new businesses and intellectual property (IP); establishing IP longevity and expanding the fan base through "uncharted innovation"; designing new experience models based on scarcity; securing leadership in the AI-based prosumer market; and implementing true global governance.First, Lee said there is a need to prove the validity of preemptive investments in new businesses and artist IP. "We have confirmed meaningful traffic expansion, and now we must transition to the stage of generating effective revenue to ensure sustainable business viability," he explained. "When investments yield results, new investments gain legitimacy and a virtuous cycle of growth is established."He added that the essence of Hybe's business lies in achieving preemptive innovation through the convergence of content and technology based on core IP of music and artists, thereby delivering immersive experiences to fans in new ways. "This means laying the foundation for Hybe artists to exist as unrivaled IP with the highest level of completeness and sustainability regardless of environmental changes," Lee said.Lee also emphasized the need to design new experience models based on scarcity. "Scarcity is an important factor that can enhance the added value of fandom business and fan experiences," he said. "2026 will be an important year when scarcity-based online-offline integrated experience models are designed and tested for innovation in future music fandom business models, just as Hybe has done in the past."Securing leadership in the prosumer market, where fans and users directly produce and exchange content, is also crucial, Lee noted. "We need to apply an integrated and specific response model from both creative and platform perspectives," he said. "By establishing a fan-to-fan model where fans can freely create and communicate while proactively protecting IP value, we can set market standards."Regarding future global strategy, Lee said: "We will build integrated governance that organically shares core assets and know-how such as resources, personnel, and content distribution among global entities, increasing cross-border project cases and realizing true global synergy."Finally, Lee said: "Hybe's growth philosophy is clear: creating top-tier IP, leading fandom business, and expanding those achievements into new markets and genres. The protagonists who will lead this journey are all of us. I hope each and every Hybe employee will become 'a driving force and partner of growth.'"With BTS set to make a full-group comeback on March 20 and K-pop having proven its firm position as a mainstream force in the global market since last year, attention is focused on "Hybe 2.0 results" as Hybe's domestic and international label artists are widely expected to make an even greater mark in global markets this year.Related Video#Hybe#BTS#Kpop#Hybe2.0#BTSComeback#KpopNews#FandomBusiness#EntertainmentIndustryAI-translated from Korean. Quotes from foreign sources are based on Korean-language reports and may not reflect exact original wording.View original article→Translation PolicyRelated ArticlesBTS New Album 'ARIRANG' Surpasses 3 Million Spotify Pre-savesPublished 2026.02.04. 09:49:55BTS to Perform at Gwanghwamun Plaza in Netflix Global LivestreamPublished 2026.02.03. 14:26:26Psy, BTS Knocked but Fell Short: "K-pop Must Secure Artistry Beyond Popularity"Published 2026.02.02. 17:51:17← Back to HomeSeoul Economic DailyAboutContactTermsPrivacyCopyright ⓒ Sedaily, All right reserved
